Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Angelman syndrome ( AS ) is caused by chromosome 15q11 - q13 deletions of maternal origin , by paternal uniparental disomy ( UPD ) 15 , by imprinting defects , and by mutations in the UBE3A gene .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Angelman syndrome (AS) |
| Chromosome 15q11 - q13 deletions of maternal origin |
| Paternal uniparental disomy (UPD) 15 |
| Imprinting defects |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Angelman syndrome (AS) |
| Chromosome 15q11-q13 deletions |
| Imprinting defects |
| Paternal uniparental disomy (UPD) 15 |

Explanation:

* Angelman syndrome (AS) is the primary disease mentioned in the paragraph.
* Chromosome 15q11-q13 deletions and paternal uniparental disomy (UPD) 15 are causes of Angelman syndrome, so they are valid disease entities.
* Imprinting defects is also a cause of Angelman syndrome, so it is a valid disease entity.
